name: daily-portfolio
prompt: Daily portfolio report. Run: 1) `botcore get_paper_portfolio` 2) `botcore get_paper_closed_trades` 3) `botcore get_paper_open_trades`. Create report with balance, daily PnL, win rate, trade list, open positions. Send to Telegram using `botcore send_telegram_notification` with the report. Do NOT skip sending to Telegram.
